title: SPOCRA: Re-location Fund for SPOs
description: Adversarial regulation being passed into law is becoming more real making previous legal SPO businesses unable to operate legally.
solution: SPOCRA contingency plan for this real disaster threat is to support key community SPOs with funds set aside for re-location.
experience: The SPOCRA body consists of highly experienced stake pool operators possessing a broad range and depth of skillsets.
